_source.short_desc: Launch, manage, measure, and grow your grants and social impact programs with Submittable's intuitive, flexible cloud-based platform.
_source.long_desc: Submittable powers you with tools to launch, measure, and grow your social impact programs, locally and globally. From grants and corporate social responsibility programs to awards and scholarships. The start-to-finish platform makes your workflow smarter and more efficient, leading to better decisions and bigger impact. Easily report on success, and learn for the future-Submittable is flexible and powerful enough to grow alongside your programs.
_source.pricing_details: Get in touch so we can price out only the features and capacity you need.
_source.target_audience: Corporations, organizations, foundations, non-profits, and associations of any size, anywhere in the world. Power your grantmaking, employee volunteering and CSR programs with Submittable.

media.caption: Measure and report on impact with automated aggregation of quantitative and qualitative data.
Screen applicants for eligibility, including their IRS EIN number, before they get to your main application.
Stay on budget and on schedule with Submittable's Funds Tracking and Distribution capabilities.
Analyze your data to report on success and learn for next time with on demand reports and built in charts and graphs.
Gather follow up information to measure impact.

related_products.short_desc: Apply empowers organizations to seamlessly collect, manage and review grant applications and drive better, faster funding decisions.
related_products.features: Move towards your mission, faster. Create a frictionless grantmaking process with SurveyMonkey Apply (formerly known as FluidReview). Seamlessly collect and review applications online, save time with robust automations, gain insights with powerful reports, and more. Special non-profit pricing is available.

related_products.short_desc: Streamline financial processes and demonstrate accountability with Blackbaud Financial Edge NXT's complete fund accounting system.
related_products.features: Blackbaud Financial Edge NXT delivers unparalleled cloud-based financial management capabilities to keep you compliant with grant reporting standards while helping you streamline your operations. With Financial Edge NXT, capture and monitor grant activity and financials while demonstrating accountability to increase grant renewals. Ensure funds are properly allocated, track and report financial activity from any device with 24/7 accessibility.

related_products.short_desc: SmarterSelect provides a comprehensive, yet easy-to-use, online application management solution for scholarships, grants, awards, etc.
related_products.features: With an over 95% customer retention rate and over 98% customer satisfaction rate, SmarterSelect provides a comprehensive, yet easy-to-use, online application management solution for scholarships, grants, awards, fellowships, data collection, etc.  Create, collect, analyze, and evaluate applications using our mobile-responsive user interface, text message notifications, inline calculations, dynamic application rules, online recommendations, file uploads, and much, much more.

related_products.short_desc: Grants Network modernizes grants management for state, local and tribal governments through SaaS technology.
related_products.features: Grants Network is modernizing grants management for state, local, and tribal governments. The system provides a unified process and portal to search for, track, and administer funding across entire local or state jurisdictions. Whether youre managing an award or a recipient, Grants Network simplifies the entire process and streamlines communication. Grantors can create and track grant solicitations while grantees can track and report on projects all in one centralized system.

related_products.short_desc: Launch, manage, measure, and grow your grants and social impact programs with Submittable's intuitive, flexible cloud-based platform.
related_products.features: Submittable powers you with tools to launch, measure, and grow your social impact programs, locally and globally. From grants and corporate social responsibility programs to awards and scholarships. The start-to-finish platform makes your workflow smarter and more efficient, leading to better decisions and bigger impact. Easily report on success, and learn for the future-Submittable is flexible and powerful enough to grow alongside your programs.

related_products.short_desc: The most flexible and configurable platform for full-cycle program management, supporting grantmakers at mission-based organizations.
related_products.features: Informed, effective, and equitable grantmaking requires more than cookie-cutter software. Zengine by WizeHive is the most flexible solution for grantmakers, providing full lifecycle solutions, tailored workflows, engaging experiences, and invaluable impact analysis and reporting dashboards. Integrates with GuideStar, Salesforce, and 2000+ other systems. Powering some of the world's most heroic missions, including those of leading foundations, CSR programs, universities, and government programs.

related_products.short_desc: Cultivate strong funder relationships and track deadlines, deliverables, and revenue through the grant lifecycle with EveryAction.
related_products.features: Utilize modern, state-of-the-art workflows to identify and research prospective funders, track deadlines and documents throughout the grant lifecycle, and analyze results. EveryAction's powerful, unified nonprofit CRM enables nonprofits of all sizes to cultivate strong funder relationships and easily track communications, deliverables, and revenue throughout the grant process. Built and supported by nonprofit fundraisers, EveryAction is built to increase efficiency and help you raise more money.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your entire nonprofit with a single CRM! Get all the functionality you need, plus donation webpages & build-in email marketing.
related_products.features:
Manage your entire nonprofit with a single CRM! Choose the Add-on options you need, including Memberships, Case Management, Grant Management and more to create a solution tailored for your exact needs.

Sumac also offers donation webpages, build-in  email marketing tools, and it integrates with your accounting software.

If you manage unique programs and services, Sumac has a Custom Add-on that we'll configure to meet your exact needs,

related_products.short_desc: Track incoming and outgoing grants, stay on top of reporting requirements, and manage the entire grant cycle.
related_products.features: If you are a grant-making or grant-seeking organization, you need to track and manage a myriad of detailed information throughout the grant process. Exceed Beyond ensures that all aspects of the process are thoroughly accounted for and on schedule. Our Grant Management application empowers you to save time, be more productive, and get exceptional value while streamlining the grant process.

related_products.short_desc: A single cloud-based solution designed for financial planning, expense management, accounting, and transactions.
related_products.features: Workday Financial Management is a single cloud-based financial planning, accounting, and transactions solution. By combining transactions, accounting, analytics, and always-on audit in one system, Workday empowers decision-makers with in-the-moment and on-the-go financial and business insight they can act upon and plan for what's next.

related_products.short_desc: GrantHub for Grantseekers is a grant management solution designed to save you time while increasing your grant funding success
related_products.features: GrantHub for Grantseekers helps you find funders and grants, as well as track and organize all your deadlines, applications, reports, and important grant documents. Instead of using a mix of manual methods and tools (spreadsheets, task manager, calendar, file storage systems. etc.) GrantHub will streamline the creation of your application and proactively send out email reminders when deadlines are coming due. Grant consultants can also use GrantHub to track grants for multiple clients.

similar_products.short_desc: Grant Management Software to Help You Achieve Your Mission. Maximize Outcomes. Meet Performance Standards. Increase Compliance.
similar_products.features: AmpliFund is the leading purpose-built grant management platform designed for organizations ranging from government entities to nonprofits, to educational institutions to manage every phase of the grant management process. Our configurable solution provides a full suite of features needed by grant funders and recipients to maximize grant outcomes, meet performance standards, increase compliance, and achieve their missions.

similar_products.short_desc: Fluxx Grantmaker makes grantmaking and impact reporting easy. Request a demo today.
similar_products.features: Fluxx Grantmaker provides the most complete set of features designed solely for grantmaking - collaboration tools, budgeting and forecasting, grantee engagement, reporting, storytelling, and more - out of the box as part of the base solution. Grantmaker enables data-driven grantmaking via a cloud-based, mobile-optimized platform. Powered by the Fluxx Data CoreTM, Grantmaker fosters collaboration, knowledge transfer, and continuous learning that drives impact for funders and their grantees.

similar_products.short_desc: Foundant GLM is a powerful online grantmaking solution, with an intuitive platform, and guaranteed dedication to clients success.
similar_products.features: Foundant Technologies leads the industry in solutions tailored specifically to support philanthropy. More than 1500 grantmakers use Grant Lifecycle Manager (GLM) - an intuitive platform suitable for users at any technological level. Specializing exclusively in the philanthropic sector, Foundant has dialed in what it means to provide exceptional customer service and support with Client Success Managers dedicated to and trained in client success.

similar_products.short_desc: Submit.com's feature-rich yet easy-to-use secure online platform delivers organisations one seamless grant management solution.
similar_products.features:
Submit.com's Grant Management Software is the most flexible on the market that will adapt to your current grants management process and grow and expand with you.

Feature-rich yet easy-to-use secure online platform delivers organizations one seamless Grant Management solution for the entire grants lifecycle. 

Create and personalize applications, manage all of the back-end administration and review, and take care of reporting, process, and impact, all from one location.

similar_products.short_desc: Fully customizable, all-in-one cloud-based grant management platform to launch, manage, measure, impact report and grow.
similar_products.features: CommunityForce Grant Management Software is the philanthropy industry's leading cloud-based all in one grants platform, enabling users to prospect, collaborate, report and analyze in real time. Integrations with Salesforce and 100+ other systems, powering some of the world's most heroic missions, including those of leading foundations, CSR programs, universities, and government programs, with data-driven grantmaking. Join the 100+ non profits using the best in class grants management software!

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful fundraising and supporter management tools which help you work more efficiently and bring in more money for your mission.
similar_products.features: With Blackbaud Grantmaking, benefit from an open grantmaking software platform that integrates with your other business solutions while still providing an intuitive user experience. Sign in from any device, anywhere, on any browser, making it easy for staff to manage the grants workflow or share important grant management information anytime. Effortlessly setup online application forms for review from anywhere for faster approval. See how Blackbaud can add value to your organization.

similar_products.short_desc: The Optimy grant management solution coordinates all of your applications in one place in a concise and easy-to-view dashboard.
similar_products.features: Mission-driven companies deserve a customer-focused solution to manage grants across all stages of the life cycle. Optimy's grant management software enables you to receive and select grants applications to better serve the ones you are trying to help and at the same time to manage and report on your impact to those who offer their support. With Optimy, you get a personalised service, we believe in human interaction and put it in the centre of our work.

similar_products.short_desc: Good Grants is a grantmaking platform that helps grantmakers around the world affordably accept, manage and fund grant applications.
similar_products.features:
Good Grants is an internationalised grantmaking platform that helps small to medium-sized grantmakers around the world affordably accept, manage and fund good grant applications, their way.

Designed for grantmakers who have outgrown manual processes and spreadsheet program management, Good Grants offers an attractive alternative to overpriced grantmaking software. 

Good Grants empowers grantmakers to manage the entire grant lifecycle, streamline processes and optimise funding, online.

similar_products.features: GrantHub for Grantseekers helps you find funders and grants, as well as track and organize all your deadlines, applications, reports, and important grant documents. similar_products.short_desc: InfoStrat's Grants Manager Plus is a Microsoft Dynamics 365-powered grant management solution that simplifies the entire grant process.
similar_products.features: InfoStrat's Grants Manager Plus provides grantors with an all-in-one, integrated solution that simplifies the grants process from initial solicitation through review, scoring, award, payment processing and post award reporting.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fund Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fund Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fund Accounting software automates accounting and portfolio management functions for nonprofit organizations, alternative asset managers, private bankers, foundations and government agencies. Fund administrators utilize these applications to assist in strategic decision making and to increase accountability across an organization's financial operations. Fund Accounting software also assists with regulatory compliance management and financial reporting on portfolio performance. Fund Accounting software is related to Accounting software and Government software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fundraising software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fundraising tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fundraising software manages donor and pledge information associated with fundraising campaigns. Development professionals use Fundraising applications to enhance their ability to locate, manage and grow donor sources. Fundraising software facilitates cost effective targeting of likely donors, tracks pledges, and manages contributions and donor relationship management. These applications also provide a variety of tools allowing fundraisers to track the effectiveness of their development campaigns. Fundraising software is related to Church Management software, Event Management software and Political Campaign software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Nonprofit software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Nonprofit tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Nonprofit software automates all aspects of nonprofit operations from database management, to fundraising, to accounting and CRM. Nonprofit software is related to Donation Management software and Nonprofit Accounting software.

Collect applications and registrations from attendees, presenters, exhibitors and volunteers/staff, and maintain all communication and follow up in a single platform. You team can easily collaborate, review, and approve from anywhere. Join more than 10,000 companies that streamline their submission processes with Submittable.

related_products.short_desc: Organizers of events of all sizes use Eventbrite to power their live experience.
related_products.features: Eventbrite is a ticketing and event technology platform that helps businesses organize and sell tickets to events online  while helping people discover events that fuel their passions. From workshops to concerts to conferences to world-renowned film and music festivals, Eventbrite houses events of all shapes and sizes. Eventbrites powerful platform, which can be accessed online or via mobile apps, scales from basic registration and ticketing to a fully featured event management platform.

related_products.short_desc: GoTo Webinar powers millions of webinars each year and is now part of GoTo Connect, all-in-one communications software built for SMBs.
related_products.features: GoTo Webinar is trusted by more customers than any other online webinar solution and powers millions of webinars each year. Whether you use webinars for marketing, training, or corporate communications, GoTo Webinar puts the fun back into webinars with reliable technology that's super simple to use. Get the features, integrations and analytics you need to engage your audience and make personal connections that drive your business.

related_products.short_desc: Airtable is the database that anyone can use with a beautiful spreadsheet interface.
related_products.features: Airtable is the relational database for the rest of us. With a spreadsheet-like interface that anyone can use, realtime collaboration, and rich features like file attachments and reporting, Airtable is the friendliest modern database.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based software with event app, event registration, event marketing, and event management for in-person/virtual/hybrid events.
related_products.features:
Whova is an all-in-one event management solution that consists of an award winning event app, efficient online registration, powerful event marketing, and time-saving event management tools. 
Whova has won the Event Technology Award for 5 years in a row and has powered over 30,000 in-person and virtual/hybrid events for all kinds of organizations in over 100 countries, including American Express, Microsoft, Hilton, Lego, IKEA, L'Oreal, American Marketing Association, Harvard University, and NASA

related_products.short_desc: A complete event marketing and management platform that handles the entire event lifecycle (in-person & virtual) from start to finish.
related_products.features: Cvent delivers an all-in-one event platform for any event, and every event. Our platform simplifies the management of each stage of the event lifecycle while giving you the data and insights you need to maximize your value. Whether in-person, virtual, or hybrid, you'll have a single platform with everything you need to find suppliers, engage attendees, maximize sponsor value, and capture important event data.

related_products.short_desc: A number of companies use Bitrix24 as free event management software, since it comes with all the necessary tools for the job.
related_products.features: A number of companies use Bitrix24 as free event management software, since it comes with all the necessary tools for the job. First, there is CRM and client management module that lets you create quotes and invoices, send emails and manage vendors. Second there are shared calendars that let you schedule and book multiple venues. Third, there?s a project management module and task templates that organizers use to manage ground crews.

related_products.short_desc:
Everything you need to manage your event business: proposals, contracts, payments, and more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.
related_products.features:
HoneyBook makes it easy for event managers to book more clients, manage projects, and get paid-all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

Get your first 6 months for just $1/mo with code "ONLY1".

related_products.short_desc: Tripleseat is a catering and event management platform for restaurants, hotels, and unique venues.
related_products.features: Tripleseat is a catering and event management platform for restaurants, hotels, and unique venues that will increase sales and streamline the booking process. It is the first web-based system created by hospitality event managers for hospitality event managers. Since 2008 Tripleseat has taken the restaurant business by storm providing solutions and simplifying the event process from start to finish. Over 2,500 venues and 18,000+ event industry expert trust Tripleseat.

related_products.short_desc: Create a beautiful event website in minutes. Trusted by more than 300,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike and MIT.
related_products.features:
Create a beautiful event website in minutes. 

Build an event website, collect registrations, sell tickets, send invites, track attendees, and promote your event online. Reliable and secure. 

Trusted by more than 500,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike, MIT and Refinery29.

related_products.short_desc: The eSPACE Work Order Management module is the most comprehensive facility management software on the market!
related_products.features:
eSPACE has best-in-class customer service and ongoing development support, Our Work Order Management module is the most comprehensive facility management software on the market! Some of our key features includes:

- Work Orders and Assignments & Inventory Control
- Robust Reporting Options & Equipment Tracking
- Preventive Maintenance
- Vendor Portal

Take us on a free test drive for 30 days or request a free demo today!

related_products.short_desc: Event management software for fundraising including silent auctions, live auctions, online bidding, mobile bidding & more!
related_products.features: Simple, Affordable, Powerful software for in person, hybrid or virtual events.  Supports live auctions, paper or online/mobile silent auction bidding, custom ticketing, seating management, custom color branding, donation bundling with multiple high resolution photos, guest self-checkout, monetary donations, marketing communications, detailed reporting, sponsor recognition and more. Our best in class customer service is FREE via phone or email. We're here to help!

similar_products.short_desc: Hearty technology, lightweight package. We combine serious event management software with a platform designed for regular humans.
similar_products.features: Swoogo is the #1 event management software that empowers event organizers to run effective in-person, virtual, and hybrid events. We provide a platform that creates a satisfying experience for you to build ROI positive events on repeat for your attendees. Our platform includes UNLIMITED events & registrations , personalized registration flows, built-in attendee analytics, seamless CRM and payment integrations, website+email marketing tools with automation, & best-in-class customer support.

similar_products.short_desc: Event management suite with registration, ratings, mobile app, payments, speaker mgmt, space layout, and more. Live & virtual events.

Modern and easy to use for event hosts and attendees. Website creation, customized registration, free web-based mobile app, session ratings, speaker ratings, payment processing, speaker/agenda management, space layout, CEU's, etc.   Flexible configuration options serve virtually any event business model.  Rated tops by Capterra!

similar_products.short_desc: Whether hybrid, virtual or in-person, eShow provides the professional tools and web-based solutions necessary for event management team
similar_products.features:
Whether hybrid, virtual or in-person, eShow provides the professional tools and web-based solutions necessary for event management teams worldwide. _source.short_desc: Launch, manage, measure, and grow your grants and social impact programs with Submittable's intuitive, flexible cloud-based platform.
_source.long_desc: Submittable powers you with tools to launch, measure, and grow your social impact programs, locally and globally. From grants and corporate social responsibility programs to awards and scholarships. The start-to-finish platform makes your workflow smarter and more efficient, leading to better decisions and bigger impact. Easily report on success, and learn for the future-Submittable is flexible and powerful enough to grow alongside your programs.
_source.pricing_details: Get in touch so we can price out only the features and capacity you need.
_source.target_audience: Corporations, organizations, foundations, non-profits, and associations of any size, anywhere in the world. Power your grantmaking, employee volunteering and CSR programs with Submittable.

media.caption: Measure and report on impact with automated aggregation of quantitative and qualitative data.
Screen applicants for eligibility, including their IRS EIN number, before they get to your main application.
Stay on budget and on schedule with Submittable's Funds Tracking and Distribution capabilities.
Analyze your data to report on success and learn for next time with on demand reports and built in charts and graphs.
Use the inutitive drag-and-drop form builder to create forms with many question types, incorporate logic, and accept file uploads.

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Archiving & Retention
category_features.definition: Process of moving and separately storing data that is not actively used or continuous storage of data for compliance purposes

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Drag & Drop
category_features.definition: Click and object and drag and drop through an interface

category_features.name: Forms Creation & Design
category_features.definition: Create and design new forms from scratch using templates and design tools, or scan and convert existing forms into the system

category_features.name: Full Text Search
category_features.definition: Look through entire documents, not just sections

category_features.name: Process/Workflow Automation
category_features.definition: Design workflow paths once and apply the logic to enable automatic creation of future processes and workflow

category_features.name: Version Control
category_features.definition: Track revisions and updates to collateral, and navigate between versions of the same documentation

category_features.name: Compliance Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and access client/customer contracts

category_features.name: Grant Application Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the status of grants throughout the application lifecyle

category_features.name: Grant Award Tracking
category_features.definition: Track grant submission requirements, deadlines, and financial documentation for awarded grants

category_features.name: Grant Discovery
category_features.definition: Automatically search funding sources and alert uses when grant opportunities arise

category_features.name: Fundraising Management
category_features.definition: Activities related to raising money for a specific cause

category_features.name: Volunteer Management
category_features.definition: Manage volunteer information and direct volunteer resources

category_features.name: Attendance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track specific people who attended events or the total number of attendees

category_features.name: Calendar Management
category_features.definition: Create, manage, and share multiple calendars

category_features.name: Communication Management
category_features.definition: Communicate with and outreach to followers/customers/clients in multiple ways

category_features.name: Event Management
category_features.definition: Schedule and manage the logistics of activities and other gatherings

category_features.name: Membership Management
category_features.definition: Database of members to track personal information of individuals and families

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Recognition Management
category_features.definition: Track volunteer performance and award those who exceed certain criteria

category_features.name: Registration Management
category_features.definition: Make a list of and register attendees for an event

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Volunteer Recruiting
category_features.definition: Advertise volunteer opportunities and recruit new volunteers

related_products.short_desc: Create forms easily and turn responses into workflows on monday.com's open platform so your team can handle requests all in one place.
related_products.features: Digitize your forms and turn responses into workflows easily with monday.com's open platform without any coding. Create forms in minutes with pre-made templates, and share a link to get responses from non-devs, clients, or customers. Compile responses into a visual board if you need to track the status of open tickets in one place. Or, generate reports from replies to make better decisions about your priorities. Then add automations to offload repetitive tasks and streamline the entire process.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.

*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

From your desktop to your phone and even your tablet, UpKeep is easily accessible from anywhere at any time. Create work orders on-the-go, get notifications when tasks are updated, and receive alerts straight from your app when assets go down making your business run more efficiently than ever before.

The company offers 10,000+ ready-made form templates, 100+ integrations to 3rd party apps, and advanced design features making it the leading online form builder for organizations all over the world. It's popularly used to create payment forms, lead generation forms, registration forms, contact forms, application forms, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Teams in nearly every department across your organization can now easily create and share forms or rmbed them on your website
related_products.features:
PandaDoc created PandaDoc Forms for a number of teams like Sales, HR, Operations, Legal, and more. Easily create and share a Form by embedding it on your website or share the Form via a direct link. Zero coding required and you don?t even need a customer?s email address. 
Features like editable templates, specific signing order, and payments are also available for Forms. 
We?re pretty confident PandaDoc Forms will be the easiest form builder you?ll ever use.

related_products.short_desc: An all-in-one online PDF editor, built-in e-signature and fillable form builder.
related_products.features: pdfFiller is a GDPR compliant online PDF editor, e-signature manager and fillable PDF form builder in a single web app. Edit and e-sign PDF documents online, create fillable PDF forms and send them for signing. Share documents via email, social media or host them on your company's website. Fax, print or send PDFs via USPS right from your pdfFiller  account. Get completed copies of submitted and signed PDF forms and automatically extract data to an Excel file, CRM or database.

related_products.short_desc: Pardot's lead management features CRM integration, email marketing, lead nurturing, lead scoring, and ROI reporting.
related_products.features: Pardot empowers marketing and sales teams to work together to engage buyers, close deals, and grow relationships. Pardot's lead management features CRM integration, email marketing, lead nurturing, lead scoring, and ROI reporting to help marketing and sales teams work together to generate and qualify sales leads, shorten sales cycles, and track marketing ROI. Users can track all prospects on a site, qualify sales leads, and utilize social selling.

related_products.short_desc: Process Street is a modern process management platform for teams.
related_products.features:
Process Street is a modern process management platform for teams. We help teams share their core processes, then transform them into powerful no-code workflows.

Start with employee onboarding to set up new hires for success, then build all sorts of workflows like employee onboarding, client onboarding, and tenant screening.

Manage your team wiki and company handbook 100% free.

Join Salesforce, Colliers, Drift, and 3,000+ other businesses who use Process Street today.

related_products.short_desc: Twilio SendGrid is the leading cloud-based email delivery platform, trusted by over 80,000 of the world's fastest-growing brands.
related_products.features:
Twilio SendGrid is a leader in customer communications. Our trusted, cloud-based email delivery platform helps marketers and developers send with confidence. We are trusted by over 80,000 global customers, big and small, to drive engagement and growth through their email program.

In addition to our award-winning API, Twilio SendGrid's Marketing Campaigns offers powerful, one-to-many sending, straightforward segmentation, flexible and frustration-free campaign editing and actionable analytics.

related_products.short_desc: Easy-to-make forms that are fully automated while also fun and conversational.

Typeforms are responsive and fully customizable to your brand, giving a personalized experience while also being fully automated. The easy form builder means you can build and launch one in minutes, and it's all protected with enterprise-level security.

related_products.features: Bitrix24 is #1 free form builder used by over 8 million companies worldwide. External (website) and internal (requests) forms. Natively integrated with Bitrix24 CRM and form automation features.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Process Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Process Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Process Management software enables companies to model, deploy, optimize, and manage business processes. Business Process Management solutions offer a collaborative, continuous conduit through which to institute changes and distribute information throughout an enterprise. Organizations use these applications to coordinate their business environment, schedule and synchronize changes, test the effectiveness of new strategies, and institutionalize best practices. Business Process Management software is related to Systems Integration software and Workflow Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Content Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Content Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Content Management (CMS) software (CMS) is used for managing digital content across the enterprise and often refers specifically to managing websites and editing web content. There are many different kinds of CMS solutions on the market including both open-source and proprietary solutions. Many Content Management solutions allow the creation, modification and removal of content from the web site without extended knowledge of HTML or the expertise of a webmaster. Content Management software is related to Catalog Management software and Portal software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contract Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contract Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contract Management software automates the creation, tracking, and monitoring of contracts and agreements. Contract Management software also allows for the company-wide sharing of contract documents and management of differing document versions. These contract management applications often provide top-down control and monitoring of contract status, key dates, and personnel responsibilities. Contract Management software is related to Customer Relationship Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Document Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Document Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Document Management software automates the process of managing documents from creation to storage to distribution throughout an enterprise, increasing efficiency and reducing the cost and clutter of maintaining paper records. Document Management applications provide solutions for a wide range of document needs from low specificity, high volume items such as standard forms to highly specific, low volume items such as one-to-one correspondence. Document Management software is related to Digital IT Asset Management software and Knowledge Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top PDF Editor software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of PDF Editor tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: PDF Editor software can be used to create, edit, convert, and share PDF documents. The software allows users to edit text and images within PDFs, rearrange pages, password-protect files, electronically sign forms, and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Survey software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Survey tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Survey software enables the efficient design and management of electronic surveys, polls, and questionnaires for market research, measuring customer satisfaction, and collecting employee feedback, along with many other applications. Survey software automates designing, scheduling, publishing, and conducting surveys while featuring a variety of user feedback formats including: radio buttons, check boxes, drop-down menus, and free-form text fields. Survey solutions also accommodate a variety of methodological approaches and provide data reporting tools. Survey software is related to Business Intelligence software and Reporting software.
